issue.title: [C++] An incorrect dependency leads "ninja" to re-evaluate steps unnecessarily on subsequent calls
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4811](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4811). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not sure about the root cause yet but here are the 5 steps that are re-executing

